parameters: The... actually, how many times have we
The Meeting of Lords is now in session!
A meeting with three people is...
Regardless, I'll give my report now.
Well, I personally used up a little...
so it hasn't saved up enough.
Is one such as thee even necessary
That is how it should be.
This is no place to argue.
We should ignore the slight delay!
...said the one who arrived even later.
The flow of the wind sucks ass today!
Luora and Kann are not here.
Normally, she's the one to arrive
If that one's not here, she won't be here.
Well, her showing up is a miracle anyway.
She literally never pops up, right!
Absence is also an opinion expressed.
I have no intention of interfering.
What is the topics this time?
I have three topics in mind.
The proposal of a new Reason,
and a new Lord of Reason.
This is going to be an interesting one.
Okay, let's start from the top.
Is there any Reason you think should be
After all, the world has already settled.
Because the world is always, unreasonable.
Unfortunately, I have the opposite idea!
Screw adding a new Reason, why don't we
just remove the Reason of Undeath!?
I am happy with the unchanging.
You mean you won't change anything?
No, I wish for a Reason to be imposed.
For this world to be stagnant,
for the ones within to never change.
One does not expect that decision
Looks like opinions wary, I suppose.
Two votes for keeping it as is, then...
If the world changes just like that,
the people will be in chaos.
That is why we need the unchanging.
But to impose that is also to bring change.
I think keeping it like this is fine.
My opinion earlier... was just something personal.
Say, why don't we abolish the Reason of Undeath
Why do you want to die so badly?
I don't want to die, no!
I... kind of get it, yes,
but as Valco says, it's gonna be rough
if you suddenly lose the ability to revive.
The point of the topic eludes one's conscious.
What is to be said about this?
I want everyone to tell me if they've
The influence of darkness, something like that.
Neither do I... well, Water and Dark are
pretty close, so perhaps it isn't felt.
Do you know of one named Mollu?
So you didn't invite it in, then.
Is it a Dark presence or something?
It once attempted to devour all the stars.
Valco, how did you deal with it?
I mean, I expect "none at all" to be
However, a traveler slayed the being.
A child of Light by the name of Ino──
Well, let's talk about Ino later...
A monster named Carmos stirred up trouble
on my star. Ino also took care of that.
Are you SURE she's named that!?
...Well, the reason I brought up the existence
of darkness was because I feared Carmos.
It'd take a while to get the details right...
For now, let's just say she's a spirit of
darkness with a grudge on me.
So I want everyone to keep their guard up.
Carmos is hostile to me, and Parlates as a whole.
There's no telling what she'd do next.
No, I was the one who engaged her in
direct combat... and failed to defeat her.
Even if she died, she'd simply revive.
If the world is unchanging, such people
Is Kann and Luora alright, I wonder?
Nothing... But I believe they're safe.
They're not opponents to be taken down
Right, so what about the last topic?
About the new Lord of Reason, yes?
So, Ino. What do you think of him?
How about as a Lord of Reason?
I don't know. But I would love for him
to be in equal position to me.
Even THAT Muracca said that much.
I can't WAIT to meet him!
Traveler Ino is a good being,
I will not disturb this harmony.
However... that being is filled with sorrow.
Just like the rest of us here.
The heart's sorrow is darkness itself.
There is a possibility that that weakness
in his heart will be taken over by Carmos.
Shall we make an opportunity to talk
I believe I'll be absent, then.
You have to solve your problems by yourself.
Well, I have nothing to solve, anyway!
I can't wait to go home.
Let's talk a little more about Carmos.
We are the cause of her anger, after all──
Today's the Convergence of Reason, right?
I didn't misremember the date, yeah?
I'm a Lord of Reason, too.
One... one thought thee hast already
I didn't come by cus I wasn't interested.
But there's someone I must see today.
What's that reaction supposed to mean?
Expect it to happen about four more times.
Maybe she's so shocked by Kann coming
that she fainted in her own house!!
I was surprised by Kann's presence,
but is Luora absent this time as well?
She's always been the serious type.
I didn't come here at all.
A tool to create an alternate body?
Hmph... Looks the same to me!
Information's shared with the main body,
so treat this as the real me!
I'm also concerned about Luora's absence.
Army of the Night? What's that...
Everyone except you knew about them.
They're monsters that appear due to
the presence of the Dark element.
The Army has already appeared on Signine.
I dealt with them with Kilma a while ago.
The strength of Light has amplified,
If too much bias goes towards Light,
that's why this solution is temporary.
Has the darkness been felt anywhere?
Darkness ain't got nothing on it.
My star's also been the same as always.
There exists a prison beneath the
That's why I'll be investigating it.
If anything happens, call for help.
Remember Mollu, the name I mentioned
The one that wishes to consume the stars?
Huh, so such a thing existed?
You said Ino defeated it, right?
And you'd be correct. However, this time,
and is targeting the Thunder Tree.
Isn't the Thunder Tree the core of
your star? Moreover, it's also the
No matter what the reason, I will
never harm the people who live on my planet──
──However, it is a different story once
it tries to lay hands on the Thunder Tree.
No citizen of mine would dare defile
So you're killing it, after all?
If the situation calls for it.
I see your mindset has changed a bit.
But with every rule comes exceptions.
Is Mollu a part of the Army, I wonder?
It does seem to be an existence of darkness...
However, Certilt is the Star of Thunder.
It'd be uncomfortable for the Army, at best.
Right. Fire, Thunder, and Wind are
Will Luora's star be alright, I wonder?
──We can't get to the person herself,
so we'll have to investigate that ourselves.
What's Luora even doing right now?
I haven't seen her for a long while.
That's why I decided to come here today.
I need to give her a good talking to.
Kann has always mentioned that Torion
is off limits from the start.
To think Luora would ignore that...
Even though she's the most strict
Well, it's likely some kind of
Perhaps Ront is also going through
Can anyone go check out Ront right now?
I'm a little busy right now...
I have to see what's going on
I have my hands full with my
Needless to say, I can't do it either.
If it's okay to burn everything up,
I might change my mind, but no.
I can't help but rely on the help
Kann has now participated twice in a row.
One must prepare for impending disaster.
Even I can tell how things are going.
It'd be bad if I didn't come this time.
Speaking of coming, the child that
always comes first isn't here either.
Look, there's no point waiting around,
We have two more participants today.
So this is the meeting room...
...and all the other Lords of Reason!
So this is what the "meeting" meant.
This is also where we discuss the creation
of new Reasons into the universe.
Well then, could you two line up
we need to get to the point.
Yeesh... so many topics to talk about.
Virea itself is probably safer than before.
Can't we go help him out?
However, doing so would be allowing
So, will Tyvar stay like that forever...?
itself someday. Right now it's a hard
Keh. Heartless as ever, even though
such a good friend had disappeared.
I thought she and Tyvar were good friends,
but she didn't even show her face.
Would she be safe like that?
We saw Miss Luora at Ront during our
journey. She seemed to be okay.
You acted exactly as I asked you to.
How was she like back then?
we were being avoided by her, so...
What are you planning, you little...
About Luora, just leave it to me.
Now, let's move on to the next topic.
Tahati, one must state this clearly...
Now that it's come to this, it's
unavoidable that we must kill Carmos.
If we let this go on any longer,
the world will be in danger.
Carmos is some fool who dared to do some
really stupid things in your turf, right?
Should I go do it for you?
Doth thou not know the situation?\!
when we talked on one's star.
Before that, we have a different issue.
Right now, Carmos is focused on escaping
us to buy some time for herself.
Is she waiting for the Dark attribute's
I believe she is preparing to unleash
If that thing were to appear in its
absolute state, not even I will be
...If not even thou can claim victory,
No, we should do something about it
before it appears in the first place.
We have to corner her as she tries to escape.
I'd like to talk about something
If there's a way for Lords of Reason
then we could negotiate a peaceful solution.
on Carmos, I see. Or did you perhaps
What do you mean by that?
Carmos is trying to destroy Parlates
because she wants to leave this world.
Hmm, so it wasn't just a crazy
In other words, if we can send her
out like Ino said, she'd settle down?
No, hold on... If one remembers correctly,
Tahati must have spent eons trying
to get to that solution already.
However, it has not been achieved.
Which could only mean the worst, no?
Can we really not create a way to escape
from this world using the Reasons?
Are we not discussing this right now?
If there is a way to avoid fighting,
I think that would be the best.
However, I don't think we have the time
to think about that situation anymore.
Suppose we found a way to escape Parlates──
would there still be a shard of this world left?
Ino, do you have any ideas?
I will take on that duty.
Hey, are you really going to enjoy
yourself alone? C'mon, let me in.
If Carmos is intent on escaping, then
I, the least guarded of anyone here,
should be the one to pursue her.
Also, Carmos has said that she was
Does that mean there's a high
But I and Fiede will be just fine.
Hmm... That's indeed a good plan.
However, should I really leave it to you...?
Everyone else can cover other options.
If she escapes, then should we kill her there?
Well, as far as I can tell,
I might be able to predict where Carmos
Okay, then let us get started.
It's good to face them head on,
but don't get wrecked and have your
Why are you singling me out?
You're the one I'm most worried about.
You're most prone to being hard-headed.
I don't even settle things with violence
Ino, Fiede, come to my room.
